isActive() - Method in class de.crawcial.twitter.TwitterStreamer
Returns true, if the TwitterStreamer is active and a shutdown has not been initiated.
isAdminParty(ServletContext) - Static method in class de.crawcial.web.auth.UserServlet
Returns true, if no user is registered and Crawcial is in Admin Party Mode.
isAuthenticated(HttpServletRequest) - Static method in class de.crawcial.web.auth.AuthHelper
Checks the user session by receiving the session cookie of the request and checking against the database.
isDbConfigured(ServletContext) - Static method in class de.crawcial.web.setup.Validator
Returns information about the configuration state, checks configuration file.
isDownloadMedia() - Method in class de.crawcial.twitter.database.DatabaseService
Returns true, if the media downloader is enabled.
isLowMemory() - Method in class de.crawcial.twitter.TwitterStreamer
Return the low memory status triggered by the media downloader.
isLowMemory() - Static method in class de.crawcial.web.social.TwServlet
Returns true, if the media downloader has been disabled due to low memory.
isMediaHttps() - Method in class de.crawcial.twitter.database.DatabaseService
Returns true, if https should be used for media downloads.
isRunning() - Method in class de.crawcial.twitter.TwitterStreamer
Returns true, if the TwitterStreamer is running, even if it is shutting down.
isRunning() - Static method in class de.crawcial.web.social.TwServlet
Returns the running state of Crawcial for Twitter.

Returns whether displaying setup wizard is allowed.

Returns true, if TwitterStreamer is shutting down.
